name: Avatar
description: An avatar is a graphical representation of a user, team, or entity. Avatar can display an image, initials, or an icon.

props.name: active
props.description: Optional activity indicator - active: decorated according to activeAppearance, inactive: reduced size and partially transparent, unset: normal display

props.name: color
props.description: The color when displaying either an icon or initials. neutral: gray, brand: brand palette color, colorful: picks color based on name hash

props.name: idForColor
props.description: String to be used instead of name to determine which color to use when color='colorful'

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the person or entity represented by this Avatar. Used to determine initials and provided to accessibility tools

props.name: shape
props.description: The avatar can have a circular or square shape

props.name: size
props.description: Size of the avatar in pixels. Restricted to supported values recommended for most uses

props.name: initials
props.description: Custom initials slot. Usually derived from name prop using getInitials function

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon to be displayed when the avatar doesn't have an image or initials

props.name: badge
props.description: Badge to show the avatar's presence status

subComponents.name: AvatarGroup
subComponents.description: A group container for multiple avatars with layout and overflow handling

props.name: layout
props.description: Layout the AvatarGroupItems should be displayed as

subComponents.name: AvatarGroupItem
subComponents.description: Individual avatar item within an AvatarGroup

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the person or entity represented by this avatar

subComponents.name: AvatarGroupPopover
subComponents.description: Popover container for overflow avatars in an AvatarGroup

props.name: children
props.description: The overflow avatars to display in the popover
